item.title: ‘The Singularity Has Begun’—Strive’s Joe Burnett Says Bitcoin Is Built For AI Era

item.title: Strategy’s STRC Hits Record Volume As Demand for Other Preferreds Jumps 50%
item.description: Strategy’s STRC hits record volume as preferred product demand jumps 53.7%, fueling debate over Bitcoin-backed yield structure.

item.title: Trump Threatens New Tariffs On NATO Allies Over Greenland, Markets Start To Price in Risk
item.description: Bitcoin held near $95,000 as Trump’s Greenland-linked tariff threat rattled markets, reinforcing geopolitical risk and the crypto-as-hedge narrative.
